sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function Weathercard({tempInfo, background, cityLookup}) { const { temp, humidity, pressure, weatherMood, name, speed, country, sunset } = tempInfo; let sec = sunset; let date = new Date(sec*1000); let timestr = `${date.getHours()}:${date.getMinutes()}` return ( <>
{temp}°
{weatherMood}
{name}, {country}
{new Date().toLocaleString("en-US", {timeZone : cityLookup }) }

{timestr}
Sunset

{humidity}
Humidity

{pressure}
Pressure

{speed}
Wind

) } export default Weathercard
